channel.title: Qubes won't install
channel.description: So i download the ISO from the site>i use rufus to install it on a flash drive>flash drive dissapears from windows> I restart the PC and boot the flashdrive> I select to proceed with instalation> and imedietly gets stuck here > https://i.postimg.cc/655dmPTw/unnamed.png before any options can be chosen Do this with another flash drive> brand new> same happens And yes my hardware is compatable

item.title: Qubes won't install
item.dc:creator: awokd
item.description:
Qubes-users mailing list is a better place for your question; this forum is specifically for questions regarding Whonix on Qubes. Meanwhile, check out https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/nvidia-troubleshooting/#disabling-nouveau and https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/uefi-troubleshooting/.

Read full topic

item.title: Qubes won't install
item.dc:creator: justqurious
item.description:
So i download the ISO from the site>i use rufus to install it on a flash drive>flash drive dissapears from windows> I restart the PC and boot the flashdrive> I select to proceed with instalation> and imedietly gets stuck here > https://i.postimg.cc/655dmPTw/unnamed.png
before any options can be chosen
Do this with another flash drive> brand new> same happens
And yes my hardware is compatable

Read full topic
